task_completion.description: The percentage completion of the overall task.

correct_actions.description: The number of correct actions taken to solve the task.

incorrect_actions.description: The number of incorrect actions taken during the task.

total_actions.description: The total number of actions taken to solve the task.

action_efficiency.description: The efficiency of actions taken, measured as correct_actions / total_actions.

environment_understanding.description: The agent's understanding of the environment based on its actions and adaptability.

planning_quality.description: The quality of the agent's planning and decision-making processes.

adherence_to_task_rules.description: The degree to which the agent adheres to the given task rules and constraints.

time_taken.description: The time taken to solve the task measured in turns.
